advertiser_id.description: The unique identifier of the advertiser

campaign_id.description: The unique identifier of the campaign

adgroup_id.description: The unique identifier of the ad group

adgroup_name.description: The name of the ad group

ad_id.description: The unique identifier of the ad

tracking_app_id.description: The unique identifier of the tracking app

tracking_offline_event_set_ids.description: The unique identifiers of offline event sets for tracking

items.description: Unique identifier of an offline event set

call_to_action.description: The call-to-action text for the ad

url.description: The URL associated with the disclaimer text

secondary_status.description: The secondary status of the ad

operation_status.description: The operational status of the ad

is_aco.description: Indicates if the ad is under Automated Creative Optimization

image_ids.description: The unique identifiers of images used in the ad

ad_format.description: The format of the ad (e.g., image, video, carousel)

ad_text.description: The text content of the ad

ad_texts.description: The text content of the ad in various languages

items.description: Text content in a specific language

video_id.description: The unique identifier of the video

tiktok_item_id.description: The unique identifier of the TikTok item

premium_badge_id.description: The unique identifier of the premium badge

app_name.description: The name of the mobile app where the ad is displayed

landing_page_url.description: The URL of the landing page for the ad

landing_page_urls.description: The URLs of landing pages for the ad

display_name.description: The display name of the ad

profile_image_url.description: The URL of the profile image associated with the ad

impression_tracking_url.description: The URL for tracking ad impressions

click_tracking_url.description: The URL for tracking ad clicks

tracking_pixel_id.description: The unique identifier of the tracking pixel

deeplink.description: The deeplink URL for the ad

playable_url.description: The URL for a playable ad

vast_moat_enabled.description: Indicates if VAST MOAT is enabled

page_id.description: The unique identifier of the page

creative_authorized.description: Indicates if the creative is authorized

is_new_structure.description: Indicates if the ad is part of a new structure

create_time.description: The timestamp when the ad was created

modify_time.description: The timestamp when the ad was last modified

shopping_ads_fallback_type.description: The type of fallback for shopping ads

shopping_deeplink_type.description: The type of deeplink for shopping

shopping_ads_video_package_id.description: The unique identifier of the video package for shopping ads

promotional_music_disabled.description: Indicates if promotional music is disabled

avatar_icon_web_uri.description: The URL of the avatar icon for the ad

brand_safety_postbid_partner.description: Details about post-bidding partner for brand safety

brand_safety_vast_url.description: The VAST URL for brand safety tracking

creative_type.description: The type of creative used in the ad

identity_authorized_bc_id.description: The authorized identity for branded content

phone_region_code.description: The region code for the phone number

phone_region_calling_code.description: The calling code region for the phone number

phone_number.description: The phone number associated with the ad

carousel_image_index.description: The index of the image in a carousel ad

viewability_postbid_partner.description: Details about post-bidding partner for viewability tracking

viewability_vast_url.description: The VAST URL for viewability tracking

music_id.description: The unique identifier of the music used in the ad

items.description: Key-value pair for a UTM parameter

key.description: The key of the UTM parameter

value.description: The value of the UTM parameter

shopping_ads_deeplink_type.description: The type of deeplink for shopping ads

branded_content_disabled.description: Indicates if branded content is disabled

catalog_id.description: The unique identifier of the catalog

item_group_ids.description: The unique identifiers of item groups

items.description: Unique identifier of an item group

product_set_id.description: The unique identifier of the product set

sku_ids.description: The unique identifiers of SKUs associated with the ad

dynamic_format.description: The dynamic format of the ad

vertical_video_strategy.description: The strategy for displaying vertical videos

dynamic_destination.description: The dynamic destination of the ad

showcase_products.description: Products displayed in a showcase ad

item_group_id.description: The unique identifier of the item group

store_id.description: The unique identifier of the store

catalog_id.description: The unique identifier of the catalog

tiktok_page_category.description: The category of the TikTok page
